requirements.summary: Add new generated images to the application assets directory
acceptanceCriteria: New images are generated and placed in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are accessible and render correctly in the application
Image filenames follow the naming convention with dimensions

file_operations.description: Generate fresh produce banner with vibrant vegetables on wooden background at 1200x400 dimensions for hero section display
Generate organic farming landscape with green fields at 800x500 dimensions for promotional sections
Generate shopping basket filled with colorful vegetables at 600x600 dimensions for promotional content
Generate farm-to-table concept illustration at 400x400 dimensions for branding elements

requirements.summary: Integrate newly generated images into the Smart Shop interface to enhance visual appeal
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are referenced in relevant components
Images enhance the visual appeal and functionality of the marketplace
All image paths resolve correctly to the generated assets

file_operations.description: Update hero section to display the generated hero-banner image (frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png) as a prominent banner above the search/filter controls, and add a new section showcasing the organic-section image (frontend/public/assets/generated/organic-section.dim_800x500.png) to highlight the farm-to-table marketplace theme

Enhance the header branding by incorporating the farm-to-table image (frontend/public/assets/generated/farm-to-table.dim_400x400.png) as a decorative element or brand accent alongside the existing shop logo

Update the empty state handling to display the promo-basket image (frontend/public/assets/generated/promo-basket.dim_600x600.png) when no products match the current filters, providing a visually appealing placeholder that reinforces the marketplace theme
